game.name: Shutter Evidence
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Early Access
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Captions available, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 어둠 속에 숨겨진 진실을 밝혀낼 수 있는 사람은 오직 당신뿐입니다. 드론을 타고 범죄 현장으로 날아가 열쇠를 찾고, 문을 열고, 증거를 촬영하세요. 조심하세요 — 범인들이 당신을 발견하면 드론이 큰 피해를 입을 수 있습니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Only you can uncover the truth hidden in the darkness. Glide into crime scenes with your drone, find keys, unlock doors, and photograph evidence. Be careful — if the culprits spot you, your drone could take heavy damage.
